tagline: sampgdk allows you to write SA:MP game modes in C/C++
name: sampgdk
body:
### Downloads

You can download sampgdk development files and pre-compiled binaries for Linux and Windows [here](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/tree/downloads).

### Examples

There are a few example plugins available in the source tree:

* [helloworld](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/blob/master/plugins/helloworld/helloworld.cpp)

  Hello World game mode that shows how to initialize sampgdk and add basic things like timers and commands.

* [lvdm](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/blob/master/plugins/lvdm/lvdm.cpp)

  A C++ port of the LVDM MoneyGrub game mode.
